comment: the technical sequence of all locations
GRTS address (`final`, i.e. after prior replacements)
whether cell center or polygon are the unit reference
nested concatenation of scheme, poststratum, and target panels
collecting any notes which we took previously
notes on how to find back the marking
transient column to filter a view for ongoing replacements
explanation for replacement choice, e.g. inaccessibility
whether or not the location is permanently unavailable
indicator whether we used a replacement location
